description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Porridge With Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Porridge With Berries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 tbs cocoa powder, save 1 tbs for dusting

recipeInstructions.text: Place the milk in a heavybased saucepan with the oats and bring to the boil. Add the cocoa powder and sugar, then reduce the heat and simmer for 6-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the oats have swollen and the porridge has thickened, adding a little water to loosen if necessary.
Mix the berries with the maple syrup. Serve the porridge in warmed serving bowls with the berries spooned into the centre. Dust with cocoa powder, if liked.
